alert.note: Alert for Catahoula (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 4:01PM CDT until June 24 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CATAHOULA PARISH... At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Archie, or 9 miles southwest of Jonesville, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Catahoula Parish. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
